name: Cool Bananas!
description:
In this 2D infinite runner your job is to help your appealing little banana friend down the mountain! It's so cute you won't be able to peel your eyes of the screen! 

Controls: 

Tap the screen to jump! The longer your press the higher you jump! 

Programming - Dylan Faith

whipflash191@gmail.com

Art - Sheree Fiala

https://www.artstation.com/shereefiala

Art - Adam El Cheikh

Please Note this is a unfinished prototype and contains bugs.
